meanings.definition: Semidwarfs: Plants that are smaller than normal but larger than dwarfs.
meanings.sent1: The semidwarfs in the garden are perfect for small spaces.
meanings.sent2: I planted semidwarfs in my backyard to add some greenery.
meanings.sent3: The semidwarfs in the garden are like the middle children of the plant world.
meanings.sent4: The semidwarfs stood out among the other plants, like tiny giants.
meanings.sent5: The semidwarfs added a touch of charm to the garden with their petite size.

meanings.definition: Semidwarfs: A group of individuals who are shorter than average height.
meanings.sent1: The semidwarfs in the class always stood in the front row.
meanings.sent2: The semidwarfs at the party were easy to spot in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The semidwarfs formed a basketball team and called themselves 'The Low Flyers'.
meanings.sent4: In a world of giants, the semidwarfs found their own unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The semidwarfs brought a sense of coziness to the group with their shorter stature.
